divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my house and sitting outside. I was looking at the stars when i saw the ufo. I was just staring at it. It started moving down in a 'z' form and it then appered to be gone then there was a bright light then it shoot acrose the sky. I felt terafied at first then awed by it. No, i didn't lose sit of it.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cabot
There were no other sightings in Cabot on or around March 19th 2004
